strings.STR_L_HTML5: This game uses HTML5. If it loads but does not run, please update your web browser.
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_TAP_TO_FILL: Tap the thirsty customer to fill their cup
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_WAIT_FOR_CUSTOMER: Wait a while for them to finish their drink
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_TAP_TO_COLLECT: Now tap to collect their coupons
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_TAP_TO_REFILL: Refill your tank by tapping here then you'll be ready to go!
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_REFILL_TANK: Stop the needle on the white to get a perfect fill!
strings.STR_LEVEL_1_DESCRIPTION:
Wakey wakey!

The sun is rising and so is the temperature.

Get ready to serve some hot-headed customers.
strings.STR_LEVEL_2_DESCRIPTION:
Hot in the city!

The lunchtime crowds need their thirst quenching and Donald's going quackers!
strings.STR_LEVEL_3_DESCRIPTION:
It's the Rush Hour Rampage!

Serve the hot and bothered commuters their home-time hydration.
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_5: Repeat actions for a combo bonus
strings.STR_MEGA_TIP_DESCRIPTION: Grab this and get a bonus burst of extra points.
strings.STR_HYPNO_DESCRIPTION: Wooo! You are feeling sleepy... Hypnotise all customers so they give tokens immediately!
strings.STR_SPLASH_ATTACK_DESCRIPTION:
They want water?!
I'll give them water!
Get ready for a super-soaking...
strings.STR_INSTANT_FILL_DESCRIPTION: Insta-fill your tank full of combo-charged super water.
strings.STR_SHARK_DESCRIPTION: If things get out of hand, this will help by scaring off everyone in the park!
